pageProps.content: ## Overview of Ballerina Swan Lake Update 9 (2201.9.4) Swan Lake Update 9 (2201.9.4) is the forth patch release of Ballerina 2201.9.0 (Swan Lake Update 9) and it includes a new set of bug fixes to the compiler. ## Update Ballerina Run the command below to update your current Ballerina installation directly to 2201.9.4 by using the [Ballerina Update Tool](/learn/update-tool/). ``` $ bal dist pull 2201.9.4 ``` ## Install Ballerina If you have not installed Ballerina, then, download the [installers](/downloads/#swanlake) to install. ## Language updates ### Bug fixes To view bug fixes, see the [GitHub milestone for Swan Lake Update 9 (2201.9.4)](https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang/pulls?q=is%3Apr+milestone%3A2201.9.4+is%3Aclosed).
